name: Tactical Illusion
description:
Top down shooter with some special mechanics, such as illusions - my take on the theme, and EMP grenades.

I wanted to add some more puzzle-like levels, but ran out of times, so it's only four levels long (and the fourth is more action-based)

I ran out of time before making the humans. The enemies uh... it was clearly intentional that they look a bit like their wearing turtle helmets.

Credits:

Music and a few sfx from https://soundimage.org/

gun sound effects from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com

Explosion from https://freesound.org/people/derplayer/sounds/587189/

Some from free-sound org, but I lost the links
